text: Zygaspis kafuensis is a worm lizard species in the family Amphisbaenidae. It is endemic to Zambia. ==References== Category:Zygaspis Category:Reptiles of Zambia Category:Endemic fauna of Zambia Category:Reptiles described in 1997 Category:Taxa named by Donald George Broadley Category:Taxa named by Sheila Broadley
title: Zygaspis kafuensis
